alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin; Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 14 at 3:32AM CST until January 15 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 AM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...A mix of freezing rain and sleet possible. Total ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible in addition to light sleet accumulation up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Louisiana and west central, north central and northeast Mississippi. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Watch, from this evening through late tonight. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Monday through Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on the possibility of hazardous travel conditions and the potential for sporadic power outages.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Mississippi can be obtained by visiting mdottraffic.com, dotd.la.gov in Louisiana and idrivearkansas.com in Arkansas.
